attributes.action: give advisory control of the BBC to John Humphrys, Jeremy Paxman, Eddie Mair and Laurie Taylor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a need to restore the BBC's international image which has been tarnished recently. It is a government responsibility to maintain high standards of an organisation that represents the UK round the world and maintain a trustworthy service to it's license payers.  
 
An advisory panel needs to be set up to advise and guide the BBC back to it's core values.

A group with the experience and dedication to achieve these ends are,
John Humphrys, Jeremy Paxman, Eddie Mair and Laurie Taylor.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
